caladaptr 0.3.0

Reference

API Request Constructors

Functions that collectively construct a Cal-Adapt API Request object

ca_loc_aoipreset()

Adds a preset location to a Cal-Adapt API request

ca_loc_pt()

Assign point location to a Cal-Adapt API request

ca_loc_sf()

Use a sf data frame as the location for a Cal-Adapt API request

ca_cvar()

Assign climate variable(s) to a Cal-Adapt API call

ca_gcm()

Assign GCM(s) to a Cal-Adapt API call

ca_period()

Assign temporal aggregation period to a Cal-Adapt API call

ca_scenario()

Assign emission scenario(s) to a Cal-Adapt API call

ca_years()

Adds the start and end year to a Cal-Adapt API call

ca_dates()

Adds a start and end date of a Cal-Adapt API call

ca_options()

Add processing options to a Cal-Adapt API call

ca_apireq()

Creates a new API request object

Fetching Data

Functions that fetch data from the Cal-Adapt server and reformat the results

ca_getvals()

Get values from an API request object

ca_vals2tbl()

Converts a Cal-Adapt values list to a data frame

ca_getrst()

Get raster from an API request object

Finding and Specifying Data

Functions and constants to help you identify and specify datasets when constructing an API Request object

ca_catalog_rs()

Get the Cal-Adapt raster series data catalog

climvars

Climate Variables

gcms

Global Climate Models

periods

Temporal aggregation periods

scenarios

Scenarios

Working with Area-of-Interest Presets

Constants to help you specify a preset area-of-interest when constructing an API Request object, and get the geometry

aoipreset_types aoipreset_idflds aoipreset_idval

Area-of-Interest Presets

ca_aoipreset_geom()

Get the geometry of an AOI Preset area

Helper Functions

Constants to help you specify a preset area-of-interest when constructing an API Request object, and get the geometry

ca_baseurl

Cal-Adapt Base URL

Manage Package Options

Manage package settings

ca_getcache() ca_setcache()

Manage Cache Directory
